item.description:
Hey boys, in part two of our winging weekend, the Wingmen will meet up in New Haven Saturday night, May 2nd.

There most likely will not be a pre-meetup this night due to scheduling problems with the sr. members but we will meet at 11 o'clock at Black Bear. This doesn't mean people should wait until 11 o'clock to get to New Haven to start talking to people. By all means, go out earlier, get social and then meet up with us and bring some women with you.
JC
item.name: Saturday Night - May 2nd - New Haven
